Mays si no deyssen, lahoras cove que la femna sia cristirizada de mucellage de ptilli e mucellage de fenugrec am cizami.	But if it does not descend, then it is necessary that the woman be treated with poultices of plantain and fenugreek with cumin.
E aprop comanda a lu, aprop le cristeri, que sia compremuda e fay aquela stornudar am condisi; e te la boca de lu e·l nas de lu per huna hora, quar le fet sira foro-getat tantost.	And now command him, now the one applying the poultice, to be firm and make the woman sneeze with force; and hold her mouth and nostrils for one hour, for the fetus will be expelled soon.
E si las doas mas del fet so foro-getadas al comensament, lahoras cove que tu redusiscas aquelas am fecilitat petit a petit.	And if the two hands of the fetus are expelled at the beginning, then you must gently return them little by little.
Mays si no obezeys al intrament, lahoras pausa la femna sobre una cezelha e leva les pes de lu sus, e aprop concuceys la cezelha sobre la terra; e la femna sia tenguda que no caia deves la concussio.	But if you do not succeed in the procedure, then place the woman on a table and lift her feet up, and then lower the table onto the ground; and the woman should be held so she does not fall during the action.
E si las mas no son dedintz tornadas e morr le fet, lahoras inscideys aquelas e extratz le romament del fet o lia le cors a la ma de lu am drap e extratz aquel am equalitat, quar aquel sira foro-getat.	And if the hands are not returned and the fetus dies, then cut them and remove the remaining part of the fetus or tie the body to the woman's hand with a cloth and remove it evenly, for it will be expelled.
De eyssiment del embrio sobre les sieus pes.	Of the expulsion of the embryo from its feet.
Quan le fet yeys sobre les sieus pes, lahoras cove que tu impelliscas aquels en sus, e aprop convertas le fet petit, e aprop que engualhes aquel, e aprop que prenguas un pe de lu e extendas aquels petit a petit.	When the fetus is on its feet, then you must push them upwards, and then turn the fetus gently, and then cradle it, and then take one of its feet and extend it gently.
Mays cum son eyssit entro a las coyssas, lahoras tu comanda a lu que se exprema, e fay aquela extornudar am condizi, quar sira foro-getat si Deus lo vol.	But when it has emerged between the thighs, then you instruct it to strain, and make it cough with force, for it will be expelled if God wills it.
E si no es foro-getat am aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras tu retorna le fet petit a petit entro que pauses aquel segon figura natural, quar aquel sira lahoras foro-getat am leugier eyssiment.	And if it is not expelled with what we have recounted, then you return the fetus little by little until you place it in its natural position, for it will then be expelled with an easy delivery.
E si es prohibit am tot aquo que havem recomtat, lahoras pren de musellage de altea e de goma dissolvuda, e percuteys tot en le mortier per bona percussio, e aprop linieys am aquo le conh de la femna, el pus bas del ventre de lu.	And if it is not expelled with all that we have recounted, then take marshmallow and dissolved gum, and pound it well in a mortar, and then apply it to the vagina of the woman, to the lower part of her abdomen.
E aprop fay aquela cezer en aygua tebeza, entro que consegua les ypocondias.	And then apply a poultice in lukewarm water, until the hypochondria (the lower ribs and sides of the abdomen) are eased.
E cum vezes que las partidas dejos de lu so lenificadas, lahoras fay a lu subfumiguacio de mirta e sub-pausa aquela a lu.	And when the lower parts of the body are soothed, then apply a fumigation of myrtle and place it over the patient.
E quan te la sub-fumiguacio per una hora, lahoras tu la fay sezer sobre una cezelha, e aprop fay aquela stornudar e extrenh la boca de lu, e levas de aquela, e prem la partida pus bassa del ventre de lu am leugiera compressio, quar le fet sira tantost foro-getat.	And when the fumigation has been applied for an hour, then you place it on a linen cloth, and then make the person sneeze and press their mouth shut, and remove the cloth and apply gentle pressure to the lower abdomen, for the fetus will soon be expelled.
Eyssiment del fet sobre les sieus denols e las suas mas.	The fetus is now out of the woman's genitals and her hands.
Quan le fet eyssira segon aquesta forma, lahoras tu engenies en entrometen las suas mas petit a petit; e aprop la femna stia evessada sobre le sieu col, e les pes de lu pengo en jos, e aquelas sia jasent sobre le lieyt, e complegua las suas mas.	When the fetus emerges in this way, then you gently ease the woman's hands out of the way; and then have the woman rest on her back, with her feet hanging down, lying on the bed, and bring her hands together.
E aprop prem sobre le ventre de lu petit a petit, e aprop extratz aquo que es dejos les pes de lu de las aurelhas entro que sia preparada en la partida pus dejos.	And then gently press on the woman's abdomen, and then pull whatever is below her feet from the ears until it is ready in the lowest part.
E si le fet no es fora-getat, lahoras pren les pes de lu e mau aquels am movement vehement, e aprop prem aquo que es sobre les ypocondres petit a petit entro que le fet puege a las partidas desus.	And if the fetus is not expelled, then take the woman's feet and move them vigorously, and then gently press on the area above the lower ribs until the fetus moves upwards.
E aprop entrometa las suas mas e engualhe le fet petit a petit, e comanda a la femna que se exprema entro que le fet sia foro-getat.	And then ease her hands into position and gently grasp the fetus, and command the woman to push until the fetus is expelled.
Eyssiment del fet latutidinalment pendent una de las suas mas.	Expulsion of the fetus lengthwise while one of her hands is used.
Sia engeniat en reduccio de la ma de lu, mays si no podes aquela reduzir, lahoras eleva la femna e fe aquela anar.	Be resourceful in reducing the [fetus's] hand, but if you cannot reduce it, then lift the woman and make her walk.
E si anar no pot, lahoras fay la jazer sobre le lieyt, e concuteys las coyssas de lu am concussio vehement, e aprop aministra liamentz les quals yeu e recomtatz de mucillages.	And if walking is not possible, then have her lie down on the bed, and forcefully squeeze her thighs, and then administer medicines that I have recommended, made from mucilages.
E si es vengut le enfantament, lahoras fay aquela sezer sobre cezelha, e aprop studia sobre la reduccio de la ma, e enguala le fet segon figura natural, e fay stornudar la femna e comanda a lu que comprema a si entro que sia foro-getat.	And if labor has begun, then have her sit on a stool, and then consider the reduction of the hand, and gently guide the fetus into its natural position, and make the woman sneeze and command her to push until it is expelled.
Eyssiment del fet sobre·l col expandudas las suas mas e la fassia de lu es al dos de la sua mayre.	The fetus is on the mother's pelvis, its hands and face are turned towards its mother's back.
Cove que la matrona tengua la ma del fet e aprop revolva aquel petit a petit, e eque aquel am facilitat.	The midwife should grasp the fetus's hand and gently, little by little, turn it, and remove it with ease.
E cum es e quant so es engualhat, e lahoras pausa sobre le conh de lu aquo que havem recomtat de oli e de mucellages.	And when it is positioned correctly, then apply to its navel what we have recommended of oil and mucilages.
E aprop comandas a lu que·s maugua petit a petit, e quan auras feyt aquo, lahoras fay aquela cezer sobre una cezelha e comanda li que sia inclinada sobre le latz dreyt, e aprop comanda a lu que sia compremuda; e fay aquela stornudar am condizi.	And then command her to gently cough, and when you have done this, have her sit on a stool and command her to lean to her right side, and then command her to push; and make her sneeze with condiments.
Exitus foetus praeparati super latus.	The prepared fetus is delivered on its side.
Quan deyssen a horrifici de la mayre segon aquesta manieyra, considera, e lahoras tu inscideys la segondina am la tua ungla entro que sia evacuada de la humiditat.	When the mother is delivered of the horrific thing (likely referring to the afterbirth) in this manner, consider it, and then you cut the afterbirth with your fingernail until it is emptied of moisture.
E si le fet es suspendut sobre la cara e·l col de lu, lahoras tu inscideys aquela del embelic, per so que no sia retengut e mora.	And if the fetus is suspended by the face and neck, then you cut the umbilical cord so that it is not retained and dies.
E aprop empelleys le fet a las partidas dedintz entro que pauses aquel segon que cove, e manda a la femna que comprema a si alcunas veguadas, e el sira fora-getat am eyssiment leugier, si Dieus o vol.	And then push the fetus towards the parts inside until you have positioned it correctly, and instruct the woman to push a few times, and it will be expelled easily, if God wills it.
Exitus geminorum aut foetuum multorum.	Delivery of twins or multiple fetuses.
Sapias que gemels motas veguadas so natz, e alcunas vetz naysso tres o quatre , mays aquo es estranh e tart s’endeve; mays v so causas foro natura, e no vivo.	Know that twins are often born, and sometimes three or four, but this is unusual and rarely happens; but these are things outside the natural order, and not living.  (This last part is a bit ambiguous and potentially referring to deformed or non-viable infants)
E conte aquelas, ja sia que sian montiplicatz, una segondina, e son seperatz per ciphac, distingen aquels enter le liguament en l’ombilic de cascun de aquels E alcunas veguadas so foro-getatz ayssi cum es un fet per eyssiment natural leugier, e so eysitz alcunas veguadas per eyssiment no-lausabla ayssi cum havem recomtat.	And count those, whether they are multiple, as a single set, and separate them by their umbilical cords.  And sometimes they are expelled as easily as one fetus through natural means, and sometimes through unnatural means, as we have recounted.
E si son dificils alcus de lor deves le enfantament e perveno ad aquo que havem dit de las figuras no-naturals, lahoras tu cura aquels ayssi cum havem recontat.	And if some of them are difficult to deliver and fall into what we have described as unnatural occurrences, then treat them as we have recounted.
E si’ la matrona subtil e fassa aquo que fa am facilitat e subtilitat, e am tarditat, e sia ingeniat segon tota figura segon que es a lu preparat de l’engen amenant a salut.	And if the midwife is skillful and does this with ease and subtlety, and with patience, and is ingenious according to every figure, according to what is prepared for her by the skillful attendant to bring about health.
Rememoratio eius quod formatur in matrice ex embrionibus et Abortiuntur.	A recollection of what is formed in the womb from embryos and miscarriages.
Alcunas veguadas son formatz en la mayre un, e dos, e tres, e quatre, e v, e vi, e vii, e mays x, e ja es deves mi verificat que una femna abortem ne getet vi, e una autra x totz formatz, la qual causa fo fayta per mensuracio dels glorios savis.	Sometimes one, two, three, four, five, six, seven, or even ten are formed in the mother's womb, and it has already been verified by me that one woman miscarried six, and another ten, all formed.  The cause of this was determined by the learned wise.
E tot aysso cove que sia en la sciencia de la matrona quar fort leu ad aquela parve semblant de aquo, e donc opause se ad aquo am so que cove.	And all this should be within the midwife's knowledge, for it is easily perceived by someone similar to her, and therefore she should apply herself to it accordingly.
Capitol .lxxvi.	Chapter 76.
De extraccio del fet quan es mort.	Of the extraction of the fetus when it is dead.
Quan tu curas le fet mort am aquo que havem dit en la divisio de la medicacio e no es defora eyssit, e tu yest forsat usar de opperacio am ma, lahoras cove que consideras si la femna es de sana vertut e no es am alcu dels accidentz per les quals sobre ela es temuda perdicio.	When you treat the dead fetus with what we have said in the division of the treatment, and it has not come out, and you are forced to use manual operation, then you must consider whether the woman is of sound constitution and is not afflicted by any of the conditions that cause concern for her loss.
Lahoras cove que la femna sia envessada sobre le lieyt sobre le sieu dos, e sia le cap de lu enclinat enjos e las coyssas de lu sian elevadas.	Then the woman should be positioned on the bed on her back, with her head tilted downwards and her thighs elevated.
E·l ministre tengua aquela de doas partz o sia liada en le lieyt per so que·l cos de lu no se extenda deves la extraccio del fet.	And the attendant should hold either both sides or bind her to the bed so that her body does not move during the extraction of the fetus.
E aprop tu humecta la boca de la mayre de lu am olis humitz e am mucellage de altea e de fenugrec e de semensa de li.	And then you should moisten the mother's mouth with moist oils and with mucilage of marshmallow, fenugreek, and linseed.
E aprop unte la matrona la sua ma am aquels olis e mucellages, e aprop entrometa la sua ma am fecilitat en la mayre, e aprop cerque am la ma loc en le qual fique les uncis en le fet.	And then the midwife should anoint her hand with those oils and mucilages, and then gently insert her hand into the mother, and then seek with her hand the place where she can hook her fingernails into the fetus.
E locs convenient en aquo: adonc tu considera si le fet es preparat que deysenda sobre le sieu cap, e lahoras tu fique les uncis en les huels de lu, o en le col, o en la boca, o en le palat, o dejos la barba, o en la furcula de lu, o en les locs propdas de las costas, o dejos les ypocondres.	And suitable places for this: then consider if the fetus is ready to descend onto its head, and then you should hook your fingernails into its neck, or into its jaw, or into its mouth, or into its palate, or under its chin, or into its armpits, or into the appropriate places on the sides, or under the ribs.
Mays si le deysendiment es sobre les pes de lu, lahoras en le pentenilh, o en le mieg de las costas.	But if the descent is on its feet, then in the groin, or in the middle of the back.
E cove que tengua le unci am la ma dreyta, e pausa la curvitat de lu en aquel loc le qual es entre les ditz de la ma senestra, e entrometa la ma am facilitat e fique le unci en alcu de aquels locs les quals havem ditz, entro que pervengua a la causa boyda.	And it is necessary to hold the fingernail with the right hand, and to place its curve in that place which is between the fingers of the left hand, and to gently insert the hand and hook the fingernail into any of those places we have mentioned, until it reaches the empty space.
E aprop pause e fique en la apposicio de lu un autre unci, o le tertz si es necessitat, per so que sia atraccio engual, e no sia extencio segon la sua rectetut tant solament.	And then place another fingernail, or a third if necessary, in its vicinity, so that there is a pulling, not a stretching according to its natural state alone.
Ans sia maugut a tota partida, per so que l’eyssiment de lu sia alleujat ayssi cum es fayt en dent deves la eradicacio de lu.	And it should be moved in all directions, so that its removal is eased just as is done in a tooth removal.
E cove en lu aquo que es entre lor que la extencio sia mollificada; e si alcuna partida de lu es retenguda, lahoras cove que la matrona unte alcus sieus ditz am oli e entrometa aquels espertament e revolva am aquels aquo que es retengut.	And it is necessary in that which is between them that the stretching be softened; and if any part of it is retained, then it is necessary for the midwife to anoint some of her fingers with oil, and insert those fingers and twist with them that which is retained.
Donc si la partida del fet es fora-getada, lahoras les uncis sian permudatz entra loc le qual sia pus aut; e fay aysso entro que tot le fet sia fora-getat.	Therefore, if the part of the fet is expelled, then the fingernails should be moved to a higher location; and do this until all of the fet is expelled.
Mays si la ma es eyssida denant l’autra, e no es possible reduzir aquela per la coartacio de lu, lahoras cove que drap sia envolopat sobre aquela; e aprop extratz aquela entro que tota sia fora-getada, e inscideys aquela o en la junctura de la ma o en le coyde.	But if the hand is pulled out ahead of the other, and it is not possible to return it by constricting it, then it is necessary that a cloth be wrapped around it; and then pull it out until it is completely expelled, and cut it either at the joint of the hand or at the elbow.
E ayssi cove que fassas en l’autra ma e en les dos pes.	And thus it is necessary that you do the same for the other hand and the two feet.
Mays si le cap del fet es gran, o accideys a lu coartacio en le eyssiment, o es en le cap de lu aygua ajustada, lahoras cove que entrometa entre les ditz espatum spinos e fenda le cap e extragua la aygua, o que discroba aquel am un instrument le qual es nompnat “alundat”, la forma del qual vindra am las formas dels autres instruments en le capitol le qual es aprop aquest.	But if the head of the fet is large, or constriction happens during its expulsion, or water is collected in its head, then it is necessary to insert fingers between the ribs and split the head and remove the water, or to cut it with an instrument called "alundat," the shape of which will be shown with the other instruments in the chapter following this one.
E semblantment fassa si·l fet es de gran cap per natura: e lahoras cove que inscida aquel am algematu, o que prengua aquel am alunda ayssi cum havem dit; e aprop extra les osses am les forceps.	And similarly, do this if the fet is naturally large-headed: and then it is necessary to cut it with *algematu* (or something else), or to grasp it with *alunda* as we have said; and then remove the bones with forceps.
E si le cap es eyssit e es coartat deves la furcula, lahoras sia fendut entro que la humiditat la qual es en le pietz sia efunduda.	And if the head is expelled and is constricted towards the fork (furcula), then it should be split until the moisture which is in its feet is discharged.
Mays si no es complicat, ni obezeys a eyssiment, lahoras tu inscideys le cap tantost segon que a tu sira possible.	But if it is not complicated, nor obstructing the expulsion, then you cut the head as soon as possible.
E si le dejos del ventre es apostemat o es en lu ydropici, lahoras cove que tu perfores aquel entro que corro la humiditat que es en lu.	And if the lower part of the abdomen is abscess-ridden or dropsical, then you must pierce it until the moisture within it runs out.
Mays si le fet es sobre les sieus pes, lahoras la atraccio de lu es leugiera e la direccio de lu a la boca de la mayre es leugiera.	But if the fet is on its feet, then the traction on it is gentle and the direction of it towards the mother's mouth is gentle.
Mays si es coartat deves le ventre e·l pietz, lahoras cove que tu extraguas aquel am drap le qual auras envolopat sobre la tua ma, e que fendes le ventre e·l pietz entro que corra aquo que es en aquels.	But if it is constricted towards the belly and the feet, then you must extract it with a cloth that you will have wrapped around your hand, and split the belly and feet until what is within them runs out.
Mays si les autres membres so ostatz e torna le cap, lahoras la metrona entrometa la ma senestra; mays si la boca de la mayre es huberta, lahoras intrometa la ma en le preon de layre, e cerque am aquela le cap, e atira aquel am les ditz entro a la boca de la mayre, e aprop entrometa en lu un unci, o dos uncis, e atire lu am aquels.	But if the other limbs are removed and the head remains, then the midwife inserts her left hand; but if the mother's mouth is open, then she inserts her hand into the air space, and searches for the head with it, and pulls it with her fingers towards the mother's mouth, and then inserts a finger, or two fingers, and pulls it with them.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada per apostema caut le qual accideys a l’u, lahoras cove que no sia trebelhat sobre lu; abantz cove lahoras aministrar efusio de causas humidas grassas.	And if the mother's mouth is constricted by a hot abscess that has befallen it, then it should not be disturbed. Instead, a discharge of fatty, moist substances should be administered beforehand.
E aministre emplastres; e segua le pacient en ayguas que mollifican e humectan.	And administer plasters; and keep the patient in waters that soften and moisten.
E si le fet es sobre le sieu costat, lahoras si possible es, sia agulat: e sia aministrat aquo que havem dit en le fet viu.	And if the fetus is on its side, then if possible, let it be turned; and what we have said about a living fetus should be administered.
E si aquo no es possible, lahoras sia inscidit en pessas, e sia extrayt.	And if that is not possible, then it should be cut into pieces and extracted.
E cove que non layssas alcuna causa dedintz de la segondina.	And it is necessary that you not leave any cause within the afterbirth.
E cum tu auras complida tota la tua opperacio, lahoras aministra aquo que havem dit de la curacio en les apostemas cautz les quals accideysso de la mayre.	And when you have completed all your operation, then administer what we have said about the treatment of boils which occur in the mother.
E si accideys flux de sanc, lahoras deyssendas en ayguas stipticas e aministra l’autra curacio.	And if a flow of blood occurs, then put them in astringent waters and administer the other treatment.
E yeu ja e vist una femna en le ventre de la qual era fet mort, e aprop sobre aquel foc autra veguada emprenhada, e aprop foc mort es le fet autre.	And I have already seen a woman in whose womb a stillbirth had occurred, and shortly thereafter pregnant again, and shortly after that, another stillbirth occurred.
Accidit al u aprop lonc temps apostema en le sieu embelic; e inflat es entro que foc ubert, e comensec a getar brac.	A long time ago, a boil occurred near his navel; and it swelled until it was opened, and began to discharge pus.
E yeu fu appelhat a la cura de lu, e medicat a lu per lonc temps, e la plagua no es consolidada.	And I was called to treat him, and medicated him for a long time, and the wound was not healed.
Adonc yeu pausegui sobre lu de alscunas causas emplastra de forta atraccio, e eyssic de lu un os, e aprop passero alcus jorns, e eyssic un autre os; e yeu fu trop meravilhat, cum en le ventre no sia os.	Then I applied some strongly adhesive plaster to him, and a bone came out of him, and after a few days, another bone came out; and I was greatly amazed, as there are no bones inside the belly.
E adonc yeu cogitegui que eran dels osses del fet mort.	And then I thought they were bones from the stillborn child.
Donc yeu enguisigui la plagua, e extrayssi de lu motz osses , la femna existent en las sieuas milhos disposicios, e ja visquec en tal manieyra per lonc temps, correc de lu un petit de brac.	Then I continued treating the wound, and extracted many bones from him. The woman, being in her right state of health, and having lived in this condition for a long time, recovered a little from the illness.
E yeu no afermegui asso esser stranh, sino quar en aquo es sciensa e ajutori ad aquo que le metge artifec am la ma per curacio aministra.	And I did not consider this to be strange, but rather that this is knowledge and assistance to what the skilled physician provides with his hands in administering treatment.
De las formas dels instrumentz que so necessaris a extrayre le fet.	Of the forms of instruments necessary for extracting the fetus.
Forma de vertitge am la qual es uberta la mayre:	A method of turning with which the mother is opened:
Aquesta es la forma de strenhedor en le qual so engualhatz les libres, al qual engualhament sian dos virtitges en doas extremitatz de dos futz.	This is the form of a clamp in which the books are clasped, with two turns at the two ends of two rods.
May empero aquesta virtitge cove que sia pus subtil de strictori, e sia fayt o de eba o de fust de boys.	However, this turning needs to be more subtle than a clamp, and should be made either of ivory or of a piece of wood.
E sia la latitut de quascun fust quays dos ditz e le marge de quascu amdos quays un dit, e la longitut de quascu es un palm e mig; e en le mieg loc de dos fustz so dos ajustaments de aquel meteys fustz les quals ja son fermatz, dels quals la longitut es la maytat de un palm e un pauc mes, e la latitut de quascu es quay dos ditz, o un pauc mes.	And the width of each rod should be two fingers, and the margin of each two fingers, and the length of each is one and a half palms; and in the middle of the two rods there are two attachments of the same rod, which are already fixed, whose length is half a palm and a little more, and the width of each is about two fingers, or a little more.
E aquestz dos additamentz sian entromeses en la boca de la mayre per que sia uberta am aquels quan tu revolves las doas prescriptas virtigges.	And these two attachments are inserted into the mouth of the mother so that it is opened by them when you turn the two prescribed turns.
Forma autra semblant de aquela pus subtil e pus leugiera:	Another similar form, even more subtle and lighter:
Sia fayta de fustz de eba o de boys segon la semblansa de forceps.	It should be made of ivory or wood, resembling forceps.
Mays empero en la extremitat de lu so dos additament ayssi cum vezes, e la longitut de aquels additament es quays un palm, e la latitut de quascu es dos ditz.	However, at its extremity there are two attachments like those previously described, and the length of those attachments is about one palm, and the width of each is two fingers.
E cum tu vols am aquels ubrir la mayre, lahoras tu fay cezer la femna sobre le lieyt les pes pendentz, ubert aquo que es entre las coyssas de lu.	And when you want to open the mother with them, then you have the woman lie on the bed with her feet hanging down, her legs spread apart.
E aprop obre la tua ma am le instrument ayssi cum fas am forfexs engualment segon la quantitat que vols de la aprecio de la boca de la mayre entro que la metrona fassa so que vols.	And then open your hand with the instrument, as if using scissors, to the extent desired, according to the opening of the mother's mouth, until the midwife does what you want.
La forma de vertitge la qual diysero les antics:	The form of vertigo, which the ancients described:
Forma de impellent am le qual es empellit le fet:	A form of pushing with which the fetus is pushed:
Forma de amisidat2 am le qual es conterit le cap gran	A form of bonding/connection with which the large head is contained.
E es asemblat a forceps al qual so dentz en la extremitat, ayssi cum vezes, e alcunas veguadas es fayt lonc ayssi cum forceps segon aquesta forma, ayssi cum vezes, al qual so dentz ayssi cum dentz de ressegua am le qual es inscidit e conterit.	And it resembles forceps, having teeth at the end, as is often the case.  Sometimes it is made long like forceps, in this form, as often happens.  It has teeth like saw teeth, with which it is incised and contained.
Forma de amesidat pauc:	A form of slight connection/bonding.
Forma de unci havent una spina:	A form of a hook having a spine/point.
Forma de unci havent doas spinas:	A form of a hook having two spines/points.
Forma de forceps a la qual so dentz de cerra am le qual le cap del fet sia conterit:	A form of forceps with closing teeth, with which the head of the thing being held is contained/held.
Forma de spatum havent dos extremitatz am le qual le cap es abscindit:	A form of spatula with two ends, with which the head is severed.
Forma de dos espatums latz:	A form of two wide spatulas.
Totz aquels instrumentz so excersitatz, e quan mes so multiplicadas las specias de aquel e so preparadas deves le artifexs, quant es pus leugier a la sua opperacio e pus aut deves les homes per la sua quantitat.	All those instruments are used, and the more the species of them are multiplied and prepared by the artisans, the lighter their operation is and the more beneficial to men for their quantity.
E no obres de aquels instrumentz ja sia qua sia deves tu aparalhat, quar la necessitat de aquels no es excusabla.	And do not neglect those instruments, wherever they may be needed by you, for the necessity of them is not excusable.
De extraccio de la segondina.	Of the extraction of the second tooth.
Quan la segondina es retenguda deves le enfantament, lahoras cove que tu comandes a la malautae que retengua le sieu ale, e aprop fay aquela stornudar am condizi, e strenh la tua ma sobre la boca de lu e sobre las nars de lu, e si per aysso es defora eyssit, bo es.	When the second tooth is retained during childbirth, then you should command the patient to hold their breath, and then make them sneeze with a stimulus, and press your hand on their mouth and nose. If by this the tooth is extracted, good.
E sino, lahoras tu pren una ola e perfora en la cuberta un trauc e pausa en aquela erbas ubrent la boca de la mayre, ayssi cum calament e ruda e anet e camamilla e scicados arabic e cassia lignea e santaurea.	And if not, then you take a bowl, pierce a hole in its cover, and place inside it herbs – chamomile, rue, anise, camomile, and Arabic cicada, cassia wood, and St. John's wort – opening the mother's mouth, as is appropriate.
Totas aquestas erbas o alcunas de lor sian submersas en aygua en la ola, e pausa aquela sobre le foc.	All these herbs, or some of them, should be submerged in water in the bowl, and place that over the fire.
E aprop pausa una canula de canaviera en la boca de la mayre, e tengua aquela entro que la evapor vengua a la concavitat de la mayre.	And then place a reed cannula in the mother's mouth, and hold it there until the vapor reaches the mother's cavity.
E aprop fay aquela stornudar ayssi cum havem dit, e la segondina sira fora-getada am velocitat.	And then make her sneeze as we said, and the second tooth will be forcefully expelled.
Mays si roman aprop aquesta curacio e no es eyssida, lahoras tu comanda a la matrona que submerge la sua ma sinistra en oli sizami o en micellage de altea, e aprop entrometa aquela en le conh e queresca am aquela la segondina, e cum aquela auras trobada, lahoras pren la e exten aquela pauc a pauc Mays si es annexsa en le preon de la mayre, lahoras entrometa la sua ma segon que havem recomtat, e quan aura trobat la segondina, extragua aquela petit a petit segon rectetut per so que la mayre no caja deves la atraccio vehement.	However, if this treatment remains ineffective and the tooth is not removed, then instruct the midwife to immerse her left hand in sesame oil or marshmallow extract, and then insert it into the socket and gently search for the tooth with it.  Once located, carefully pull it out gradually.  If the tooth is lodged deep within the gum, then insert her hand as previously described, and when the tooth is found, extract it slowly and gently to avoid causing excessive pain to the mother.
Abantz cove que sia permudada als costatz dreyt e sinestre am facilitat.	Beforehand, it is necessary for the tooth to be moved from side to side with ease.
E aprop sia ajustat en la quantitat de atraccio, quar ela obedira e evasira de adhirencia.	And then adjust the amount of pulling, for it will obey and detach from its adherence.
E si la boca de la mayre es coartada, nos ja havem recomtat la curacio am sturnutacio e am medicacio de la ola am erbas.	And if the mother's mouth is constricted, we have already described the treatment with sneezing and herbal poultices.
Mays si no es fora-getada am totas las causas las quals havem recomtadas, lahoras guarda te que no fetigues sobre aquela en iteracio de abstracio, mays empero cove que aquo que es eyssit de lu a la boca de la mayre lies a la coyssa de la femna, e aprop cristeriza aquela am enguent e tetrafarmacon; quar aquel fara poyrir aquela aprop alcus dias e sira dissolvuda e sira fora-getada.	However, if it has not been expelled by all the methods we have described, be careful not to further irritate it by repeated attempts to remove it.  Instead, whatever is lodged in the mother's mouth should be placed on the woman's thigh, and then treat it with unguent and tetrapharmacon; this will cause it to decompose over a few days, eventually dissolving and being expelled.
Mays quan se poyreys, es de lu elevada mala audor al cap, e al estomac, e aquo ledeys la malauta; e adonc cove que sian aministradas sub-fumiguacios e convenientz ad aquo.	But when it decomposes, a foul odor rises to the head and stomach, distressing the patient; and then fumigations and appropriate remedies must be administered.
Mays alcus dels Antics ja so esproatz sub-fumigacio de nazitort e de figuas seccas.	However, some of the ancients had already tested fumigations using dried nard and figs.
Forma de instrument am le qual la femna es sub-fumiguada deves la retentio de mestruas e de la segondina:	Method of instrument with which the woman is fumigated for retention of menstrual blood and the afterbirth:
Sia fayta de veyre o de eram.	It should be made of glass or earthenware.
E sia pausada la extremitat subtil en le conh e la extremitat ampla sobre le foc, e la sub-fumiguacio sia pausada sobre las brazas del foc.	And the narrow end should be placed in the cone, and the wider end above the fire, and the fumigation should be placed on the embers of the fire.
E tengua aquela entro que sia consumida aquela sub-fumiguacio e itera·n autra.	And let her maintain it until the fumigation is consumed and then make another.
De curacio del cul del enfant no-perforat.	Treatment of the unperforated anus of the child.
Motz enfantz naysso e les culs de lu no so perforatz, les quals ya ciphac subtil e opilat.	Many children are born with unperforated anuses, which are very narrow and obstructed.
Adonc cove a la matrona que perfore am le sieu dit aquel ciphac; e sino, perfora aquel am spatum agut, e guarda se que no toque le lacert.	Therefore, the midwife should perforate that narrowing with her finger; and if not, then perforate it with a sharp instrument, and be careful not to touch the sphincter.
E aprop pause sobre aquel lana enfusa en vi e oli; e aprop cura aquel am enguent entro que sia senat.	And then place over it wool soaked in wine and oil; and then treat it with ointment until it is healed.
Mays si temes que sia opilat, lahoras pausa en le trauc una canula per motz dias, e osta la quan le enfant voldra degerir.	But if you fear it is obstructed, then place a tube into the opening for several days, and remove it when the child is ready to swallow.
E ja accideys oppilacio del cul per consolidacio de plagua o de apostema; adonc cove que aquela consolidacio sia inscidida, e aprop sia curada am aquo que avem dit de la curacio e del plom.	And sometimes anal obstruction occurs due to the consolidation of a plague or an abscess; then that consolidation must be incised, and then treated with what we have said about the cure and the use of lead.
De curacio de las fistulas que endeveno dejos.	Of the treatment of the fistulas that subsequently appear.
Las fistulas que endeveno en la partida dejos pus bassa so nodacio e grossetut las quals endeveno prop del cul defora o en l’espazi de la una partida.	The fistulas that develop in the lower area, swollen and thickened, which appear near the anus externally or in the area of one side.
E es una fistula o motas.	And it is a fistula or abscesses.
E cum aquela nodacio es antiquada e corr de la humiditat aygosa blanca o poyridura subtil, e alcunas veguadas so de aquestas fistulas alcunas penetrantz.	And when that swelling is longstanding and is caused by watery white moisture or subtle putrefaction, and sometimes these fistulas are penetrating.
E aquelas penetrantz so conogudas per aquo que es eyssit de aquelas per la egressio e per ventosetat; e alcunas vetz use le malaute de egressio, e fort leu es eyssit de aquelas verm.	And those penetrating ones are known for what comes out of them through discharge and by the windiness; and sometimes the patient uses discharge, and often worms come out from them.
E so de aquelas fistulas alcunas veguadas en l’espazi penetrantz entro a la vesica, e entro al meat de la vergua; e so de aquelas penetrantz entro la junctura de la coyssa e entro al notz de la coeta.	And sometimes these fistulas penetrate into the bladder, and into the urethra; and some of those penetrating ones go into the joint of the thigh and into the bone marrow of the thigh.
E aquo en que es conoguda fistula penetrant entro al cul e no-penetrant, es que tu metas le tieu dit endic en le cul, e entrometas tenta subtil de eram o de ferr en la fistula quan no y es turtuositat.	And the way a penetrating fistula is recognized, compared to a non-penetrating one in the anus, is that you insert your index finger into the anus, and carefully insert a small probe of ram's horn or iron into the fistula when there is no twisting.
Mays si en aquela es turtuositat, lahoras entromet en aquela tenta subtil de plom o de pels de caval entro que tu sentas la tenta o le pel en le tieu dit.	But if there is a twisting in it, then insert a thin probe of lead or horsehair into it until you feel the probe or hair against your finger.
E si no sentas aquela de tot ni no procezeys del trauc alcuna causa de egestio ni verm ni ventositat, ayssi cum havem dit, lahoras sapias que es no-penetrant, e lahoras coyta te a la curacio.	And if you don't feel any of that at all, and no discharge, worms, or gas comes from the opening, as we have said, then know that it is not penetrating, and then your efforts should turn to treatment.
E quan la fistula es penetrant entro a la vesica o entro al meat de la vergua, lahoras la significacio de lu es eyssiment de urina de aquela e prohibicio de lu ad aysso que·l loc am medicina sia consolidat.	And when the fistula penetrates the bladder or the urethra, the sign of it is urination from that area and the prohibition of it until the place is healed with medicine.
Mays si es penetrant entro la junctura de la coyssa o entro al os e envencio de dolor en le circuit, lahoras senhal de lu es que la tenta perve entro aqui si en lu no es turtuositat entro al os, e envencio de dolor en le circuit de la partida; e que de lu yeys poyredura tostemps; e que no val en aquela medicacio, ni es consolidada am enguent.	But if it is penetrating into the joint or bone, causing pain in the surrounding area, then the sign of it is that the probe passes into it if there is no twisting into the bone, and pain in the surrounding area; and that there is often a prolonged illness; and that treatment there is not effective, nor is it healed with ointment.
E en totas aquelas fistulas penetrant no es curacio de tot, e la curacio de aquelas es trebalh e vanetat dels folyls metges sobre·l qual so fermatz.	And in all those penetrating fistulas there is no complete cure, and the cure of those is the hard work and vanity of learned physicians upon which you must rely.
Mays en aquela que no es penetrant e no antiqua, sanacio am ferr es sperada segon que yeu a tu recomtare, e aquo que ja yeu e proat.	But in that which is not penetrating and not old, healing with iron is hoped for, as I tell you, and this I have already tested.
E es que le malaute jagua entre las tuas mas sobre le sieu dos e eleva las cambas de lu entro sus, las coyssas sian enclinadas al ventre de lu, e aprop entromet tenta de plom, o de eram si es en la fistula turtuositat, entro que sapias le loc on perve la tenta.	And it is necessary that the patient lie between your hands on their back, and raise their legs upwards, with the thighs bent towards their stomach, and then carefully insert a lead probe, or an iron one if there is a twist in the fistula, until you know the spot where the probe penetrates.
E si aquela sent le malaute entorn le cuol, lahora cove que tu entrometas le tieu dit endic en le cuol.	And if the pain is around the anus, then it is necessary for you to insert your finger into the anus.
E si sentas en le tieu dit la tenta ja per si meteyssa descuberta penetrar, otra aquo que sentas entre le tieu dit e aquela siphac o carn, lahoras sapias certanament que aquela es penetrant; e adonc no trebalhes en aquela, quar no es en aquela sanacio, ayssi cum havem dit.	And if, when inserting your finger, you feel the probe already penetrating itself, or if you feel something between your finger and that tissue or flesh, then be certain that it is penetrating; and so do not work on that, for there is no healing in that, as we have said.
Mays empero diyssero alcus que es sana en alcus homes tart.	But however, some might say that it is cured in some men slowly.
E de la medicacio per la qual es sperat juvament en lu es que tu ignes cauteri subtil segon le ample de la fistula, ayssi cum es precedit, e intrometas aquel ignit en la fistula entro que pervengua entorn le cuol; e aprop itera aquel doas o tres vetz entro que sapias que ja son adhustas totas aquelas carns ajustadas fistuladas que so semblantz a cana de pluma de ausel.	And the treatment by which recovery is expected in this case is that you apply a thin heated cautery, according to the width of the fistula, as previously described, and introduce it into the fistula until it reaches around the anus; and then repeat this two or three times, until you know that all the flesh around the fistulous opening, which resembles the hollow of a bird's feather, has been cauterized.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder entro que en yescan totas aquelas carns que so adhustas, e aprop cura aquela am medicinas la carn engendrantz e consolidantz, e si es sanada, bo es; e sino, lahoras no es sana en degun temps per autra curacio.	And then treat it with some bandages until all the cauterized flesh has healed, and then treat it with healing and strengthening medicines; and if it is healed, it is good; and if not, then it will not be healed in any time by any other treatment.
E si la tenta intra, e no penetra entro·l tieu dit le qual es en le cul, e entre aquel e la tenta que es velament spes de carn o de ciphac, e vezes la fistula en aquo que siec la superficia de la codena, lahoras secca la codena del comensament de la fistula, e tu ve seccan am la tenta, e sia en la fistula entro que la seccio pervengua al loc en le qual perve la extremitat de la tenta, e per la tenta es liberat e catz.	And if the probe enters, and does not penetrate inside your finger that is in the anus, and between that and the probe there is a thick layer of flesh or tissue, and the fistula is on the surface of the anus, then cut the anus at the beginning of the fistula, and cut with the probe; and let it be in the fistula until the incision reaches the place where the tip of the probe reaches, and through the probe it is released and removed.
E aprop mundifiqua aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so asembladas a canula de pena de ausel e no romangua de aquelas alcuna causa.	And then cleanse those fistulous tissues, which are gathered like a bird's feather quill, so that no cause remains.
Mays si flux de sanc vezes que vengua entre tu e la tua opperacio quan ensideysses aquelas carns, lahoras le milh que sia e del pus leugier instrument es cauterizar am foc o am medicina acuta, quar cauteri am foc ajusta bonas doas habitutz: so es adhustio de aquelas carns ajustadas, e abscizio del sanc exseccacio de las humiditatz.	However, if blood flows between you and your procedure when you cauterize that flesh, then the best and easiest instrument is to cauterize with fire or with a sharp medicine, because cauterization with fire has two good effects: it burns the cauterized tissues, and it stops the blood flow and removes the moisture.
E aprop cura aquela am calguas envolopadas en boder o en caus trissat entro que·l loc geta brac, e aprop lahoras cura la plagua am enguentz carn dura engendran e consolidan.	And then treat it with bandages or a linen compress until the area heals, and then treat the wound with ointments that strengthen and heal the flesh.
E so medicinas en las quals so stipticitat e exseccio; quan lahoras es restaurada ja es sanada e no temes iteracio.	And these medicines, which have astringent and drying properties; when it is restored, it is already healed and you do not fear a recurrence.
Mays si la fistula ja perve entro al preon del cul e es elonguada de lu superficia del cos, lahoras entromet le tieu dit en le cul e inquireys am aquel.	However, if the fistula extends to the anus and is far from the body's surface, then insert your finger into the anus and investigate with it.
E donc si centes la tenta e entre tu e ela es velament de ciphac o de carn, e es propda a la penetracio, lahora no es operacio en lu sino segon via di fiducia e de speransa.	And therefore, if you feel resistance, and between you and it there is a membrane or flesh, and it is close to penetration, then there is no operation there, but rather, it should be treated with hope and trust.
La qual causa es aministrar en lu una de tres manieyras: o que cauterize aquela ayssi cum havem dit; o que secces aquela entro que consieguas la conquavitat de lu per que sia a tu possible entrometre las qualcas e la curacio propdana; e no procesiscas mot am seccio per so que no inscidas le lacert contenent le cuol, e que accidisque sobre le malaute eyssiment de la egistio ses voluntat; e aprop cura aquel am aquo que havem dit quar fort leu sira sanat; o que elongues aquel velament e mondes aquel pus que seccas aquel entro prop le cul, ayssi cum havem dit, o am tenta o am autre instrument de aguda extremitat, e aprop mondifique aquelas carns fistuladas las quals so en la seccio entro la on podes am percrustacio; e aprop esforsa te a far la restauracio de tota la plagua am seccio, e si le orrifici pus desus no es consolidat, e romangua la fistula uberta en la partida del cul, e sira pus leugier per le malaute.	This condition can be treated in one of three ways: either cauterize it as we have said; or cut it until you reach its cavity, so that you can introduce remedies and achieve a cure; and do not cut too deeply, lest you injure the surrounding tissues, and thus cause harm to the patient unintentionally; and then treat it with what we have said, for it will be easily healed; or else, remove the membrane and cleanse the pus, cutting it back toward the anus as we have said, either with a probe or another instrument with a sharp tip, and then remove the fistula tissues that are within the incision, after which you can use a scab to help the healing; and then strive to restore the entire wound with cuts, and if the opening above is not healed and the fistula remains open in the anal area, it will be easier for the patient.
E alscunas veguadas la fistula es finida segon aquesta manieyra: es quan tu entrometas la tenta en la fistula, e es en le latz del cul entorn la superficia del cos am la codena e en le marge del cul, lahoras pren tenta de perforada extremitat, que es ayssi cum agulha de preparantz les coers segon aquesta forma:	And sometimes the fistula is treated in this way: when you insert the probe into the fistula, and it is located in the folds of the anus near the body's surface, and at the edge of the anus, then take a probe with a sharp tip, which is similar to a needle, prepared in this manner:
e entromet en aquela fiel envolopat de v fiels o entorn aquels; e aprop entromet tenta am fiel en la fistula entro que consiegua la conquavitat de lu.	and insert it into that, wrapped in five or so threads; and then insert the threaded probe into the fistula until it reaches the cavity.
Mays si es penetrant en le marge del cul prop dedintz, lahoras tu extratz le fiel de aquel trauc ayssi que tu intrometas le tieu dit en le cul; e extraguas la extremitat del fiel e ajustes las duas extremitatz essemps, e estrenh cascuna, e leyssa aquo per un dia o per dos, e quan mays inscideys le fiel en la carn, estrenh be aquel entro que aquelas carns sian inscididas las quals so entre doas extremitatz del fiel e que cajan.	However, if it is penetrating near the edge of the anus, then you remove the thread from that opening as if you were inserting your finger into the anus; and you pull out the thread's end and join the two ends together, tightening each one.  Leave it like this for a day or two, and when you cut the thread into the flesh, firmly grasp it until the tissues between the two ends of the thread are cut and fall away.
E aprop cura la plagua entro que sia consolidada e sanada.	And then treat the wound until it is healed and sound.
Mays si le orrifici de la fistula no es penetrant, lahoras fay aquel penetrar, en qualque manieyre sia a tu preparat, sino que sia mot en le preon, quar no es a tu que fassas aquo per que no inscidas le lacert; e aprop fay am aquela entro que sia sanada.	But if the fistula's opening is not penetrating, then make it penetrate, in whatever manner you are prepared, but not too deeply in the region, for you must not cut into the tendons; and then treat it until it is healed.
La forma de spatum spinos am lo qual es fenduda la fistula: la curvitat del qual es mot aguda e l’autra partida es no-aguda, per so que no inscidas aquo que no es necessari, ayssi cum vezes.	The shape of the probe used to open the fistula: one curved end is very sharp, and the other part is blunt, so you don't cut what's unnecessary, as sometimes happens.
De sutura de emorroydas en las quals corra sanc en la inscizio de aquelas.	Of the suturing of hemorrhoids in which blood flows in the incision of those.
Emorroydas so segon dos manieyras, quar o so entre le cul semblantz aysi que es de carbos, o quays aquelas sian cum a gras de rasim.	Hemorrhoids come in two ways, for either they are like lumps within the anus, as if made of knots, or they are like bunches of grapes.
E de aquelas so petitas e grans, e que le sanc corr de aquelas tostemps e es una, e so motas, e so fora·l cul, e en las extremitatz de lu.	And they are small or large, and the blood flows from them constantly, and they are single or multiple, and they are outside the anus, and at the extremities of it.
Mays empero aquelas que so foro le cul so segon las mes de pauca humiditat, de las quals corr aygua citrina o un petit de sanc am cos continuabla, e so segon la color del cos.	However, those outside the anus are according to the periods of less moisture, from which yellow water or a little blood with a continuous flow comes, and it is according to the colour of the flow.
E la curacio de aquela que es dedintz le cuol es que comandes al malaute que se assela e que se exprema entro que le cuol yesca e las emoroydas apparescan a tu.	And the treatment of those inside the anus is that you should tell the patient to sit down and press until the anus opens and the hemorrhoids appear to you.
Adonc tu te coyte e suspen am uncis o que tenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, e aprop incideys aquelas deves las suas razitz.	Then you hold and lift them with tweezers or your fingernails, and then cut them away from their roots.
Mays si les uncis no so tengutz en aquelas per la humiditat de lor e mollificacio de aquelas, lahoras pren aquelas am drap aspre o am coto o am flassada de lana, e extratz aquelas am les tieus ditz, e aprop inscideys aquelas e polveriza sobre lor alcunas polveras caudas aprop la inscizio, per que sian ad aquelas en loc de cauteri; o cauteriza aquelas segon que es precedit en le capitol de cauterizar.	But if the tweezers are not holding them due to their moisture and softness, then take them with a rough cloth, or cotton, or wool strips, and pull them out with your fingers, and then cut them, and sprinkle some hot powders over their incisions, so that they will be like cauterization; or cauterize them, according to what is preceded in the chapter on cauterization.
E aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And then treat them with another treatment until they are healed.
E si le cul no obezeys a egressio, lahoras cristerisa le malaute am cristeri en le qual sia mordicacio petita, e sia lavat am aquel aquo que es en le cuol e que obezesca a egressio leugierament quan le malaute s’esprem.	And if the anus does not yield to evacuation, then prick the patient with a cautery in which there is a small bite, and wash it with whatever is inside the anus, so that it yields to evacuation easily when the patient is squeezed.
Mays si las emorroydas so defora le cul, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiera, e es que tu prenguas aquelas am la tua ungla, o que prenguas aquelas am unci, e inscidas aquelas, e aprop cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit entro que sian sanadas.	But if the hemorrhoids are outside the anus, then the cause is slight, and you should grasp them with your fingernail, or tweezers, and cut them, and then treat them with what we have said until they are healed.
E aquel que avoreys inscizio, cove que aministres sutura de lor segon aquesta manieyra: pren fiel envolopat e entromet aquel en agulha e aprop extratz las emorroydas a las partidas dessus, e fay aquel penetrar am la agulha en la razit del autra part, e envolveys las doas extramitatz del fiel en la partida pus dejos de la agulha, e so latitudinalment; e estrenh la emorroyda am strectura fort, e aprop noza le fiel e extratz la agulha.	And for those you have cut, you should apply stitches to them in this manner: take a thread wrapped around, insert it into a needle, then pull the hemorrhoids apart, and pierce it with the needle into the root of the other part, and wrap both ends of the thread in the portion below the needle, and do it latitudinally; and tighten the hemorrhoid with a strong bandage, then tie the thread and remove the needle.
E fay aquo a totas, e layssa de aquelas una e no la cozes, per so que la superfluitat del sanc corra de aquela.	And do this to all of them, and leave one of them unsewn, so that the excess blood will flow from it.
E aprop pausa sobre le cul drap enfus en oli rozat o en cerot; e pausa aquel sobre·l cuol e comanda al malaute que·s repause.	And then place a cloth soaked in heated oil or ointment on the anus; place it over the area and tell the patient to rest.
E aprop layssa aquela entro que caja; e quan es casuda, cura aquelas am enguentz o am autra curacio entro que sia sanat.	And then leave it until it falls out; and when it has fallen out, treat them with ointments or other remedies until healed.
De curacio de fistulas.	Of the treatment of fistulas.
Motas veguadas accideys per exseccacio de fenda o per costriccio de natura.	Many times they occur due to a cut or a natural constriction.
E cum so antiquadas e no val en aquela medicina, lahoras cove que tu razas aquelas am la puncta de spatum o am la tua ungla entro que sian faytas humidas e sia hostada de aquelas la escorsa pus desus, la qual prohibeys aquelas de consolidacio; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian consolidadas.	And when they are old and no longer respond to that treatment, then you must scrape them with the tip of a spatula or your fingernail until they are moist and the crust of pus on top, which prevents healing, is removed; and then treat them until they are healed.
Lahoras tu osta aquelas am razio pus vehement que la primieyra entro que mot sancno e sian excoriadas; e aprop cura aquelas entro que sian sanadas.	Then scrape them with a more forceful scraping than the first, until they bleed and are raw; and then treat them until they are healed.
De curacio de almesamir, so es clau.	Concerning the treatment of almesamir, this is the key.
Sapias que alamermar, so es clau, e no es si no notz redon segon la color del cors semblant a cap de claviel, e es fayt en tot le cors e majorment en las partidas dejos les pes e als ditz, e endeve per aquels dolor deves le anament.	Know that alamermar, this is the key, and it is nothing but a red spot, like a small nailhead, according to the colour of the body, and it is found throughout the body, especially in the parts below the feet and in the joints, and it is indicative of that disease's affliction.
E adonc cove que sia inscidit aquo que es en le circuit del clau, e sia tengut am les forfexs o am unci, e sia eradicat de la sua razit; e aprop cura aquel.	Then it is necessary to cut out that which is around the spot, using shears or forceps, and to remove it from its root; and then treat that area.
E si vols, cauteriza le segont que es precedit en le sieu capitol.	And if you wish, cauterize it according to what is described in its chapter.
Mays de veruca es eminencia petita aspre fistulada redonda sobre la superficia del cos, e motas veguadas veno en las mas dels enfantz.	But a wart is a small, rough, fistulated, round elevation on the surface of the body, and it often appears on the hands of children.
E curacio de lu es que estendas e inscidas aquela, o que estrenhas aquela am fiel o am pel entro que caja.	And its treatment is to scrape or cut it, or to squeeze it with a file or a needle until it breaks.
E si vols, cauteriza aquo, segon que havem dit, am foc o am medicina acuta.	And if you wish, cauterize it, as we have said, with fire or with a sharp medicine.
E ja so eradicadas enversas e no-enversas am le instrument le qual yeu diyre.	And now it has been eradicated, both up and down, with the instrument I shall describe.
Mays formica es eminencia petita feutrada o fistulada grossa sobre la superficia del cos anant mot en le preon, e quan le freg atroba aquela es centit en lu semblant de mordificacio de formigua, e es fayta entorn le cos.	But a pimple is a small, festered or fistulous, large elevation on the surface of the body, often found on the groin.  When the cold touches it, it feels like an ant bite, and it forms around the body.
E curacio de lu es que prenguas una canula de pena de auca o de pena de voltor, e sia fort, e pausa aquela sobre la formigua entro que la contengua le cercle de la canula de las partidas de lu; e aprop revolveys la tua ma am la canula entro que inscidas aquo que es en le circuit de la formigua, e pauses aquela en le preon de la carn, e que eradiques la formigua de la sua razit.	And the treatment is to take a hollow tube made from a hawk's or vulture's feather, strong, and place it over the pimple until the tube encircles the pimple's edges.  Then, twist your hand with the tube until you cut through what is within the pimple's circle, and place it on the flesh around it, eradicating the pimple from its root.
E si vols, fay aquo am canula de eram o de ferr segon aquesta forma:	And if you wish, do this with a tube of bronze or iron, following this method:
Sia la partida desus de la canulha trahent a subtilitat, sorda (so es no-perforada), envolopada per so que sobre le dit la aprencio de lu sia ablaviada e la revolucio de aquela.	The part above the tube should be slender, closed (that is, not pierced), wrapped so that the grip on it is firm and its rotation smooth.
E si vols cauteriza la formiga segon que es denant dit en la cauterizacio de atheyl en le capitol de cauteri.	And if you want to cauterize the pimple, do so as previously described in the section on cauterizing ulcers in the chapter on cauterization.
De forma dels instrumentz que so aministratz a dar cristeri.	Concerning the forms of instruments used for providing care.
Alcunas veguadas es fayt cristeri de argent o de lato o de eram fondut o malleat; e alcunas veguadas es fayt de aquels instrumentz petit e gran segon aquels als quals so aministratz, quar aquel que es aministrat en la curacio dels petitz enfants sia petit; e de aquel dels quals los culs son freuls o doloyrozes, les cristeris de aquels sian petitz.	Sometimes care is provided with instruments of silver, or bronze, or cast or hammered bronze; and sometimes it is done with small or large instruments, depending on those being treated, for that which is used to treat small children should be small, and those for the treatment of sore or painful buttocks should be small.
La forma de cristeri gran e pauc:	The form of large and small care/treatment.
Le cap de la canula de lu desus en le qual es liada la borsa sia ampla segon aquesta manieyra; e sia a lu distinacio la on la borsa es liada ayssi cum vezes.	The head of the cannula above it, to which the bag is attached, should be wide in this manner; and it should be distinguished where the bag is attached, just as before.
E la extremitat de lu pus dejus, la qual es entromesa en le cul, sia sorda (so es no-uberta) mot leon, atrasent a subtilita; e en la un del latz de lu sian dos traucs, e en l’autre costat un trauc, e sia la amplesa del trauc segon la groseza dels rays e pus gros un petit.	And the lower end of it, which is inserted into the anus, should be completely closed (that is, not open) very thin, and narrow; and on one side of it should be two holes, and on the other side one hole, and the size of the hole should be according to the thickness of the rays and a little larger one.
E sia la borsa en la qual sian pausadas las medicinas de vesica de bestia o de pel de ovelha, e la razit de lu sia un palm.	And the bag, in which the bladder medicines are placed, be of animal bladder or sheepskin, and its bottom should be one palm wide.
E sia perforada per motz traucs ayssi cum es revolvuda; e si l’espazi le qual es entre les traucs la grossetut del dit.	And it should be pierced with many holes, as it is revolved; and if the space between the holes is the thickness of a finger.
E aprop entromet en aquels traucs fiel fort de fiel cru le qual sia de detz fiels, o enviro aquels; e ajusta am aquel la borsa; e quan es pausada en lu la borsa, sia streyt en le cap del cristeri entre dos distingentz am fort costriccio, e aprop cristeriza am aquel quascun trauc: Mays la qualitat de cristerizar am aquel es que tu omples la borsa de la medicina, que sia escalfada segon la quantitat de la tolleransa del malaute; e guarda te que no sia trop cauda ni trop freja.	And then introduce into those holes strong, thick, crude bile, which should be of ten or thereabouts; and attach the bag to that.  And when the bag is placed in its place, tighten the top of the instrument tightly between two separating ones, with firm constriction.  Then seal each hole with that [instrument].  However, the way of sealing with that is to fill the bag with the medicine, which should be heated according to the patient's tolerance; and be careful that it is neither too hot nor too cold.
E aprop le malaute sia resupinat sobre le sieu dos, e eleva las suas cambas en sus e pausa dejos lu un cuer sobre le qual ja so les homes o un lansol; e aprop unta la extramitat del cauteri am oli o am album de huou o am mucellage de fenugrec o de semblantz; e aprop entromet aquel en le cul am facilitat, e aprop le ministre prengua la borsa e exprema aquel am doas mas e essemps am vehemencia entro que sia evacuat en le budelh tot aquo que es en le cristeri; e aprop extra le cristeri e le malaute leva las suas cambas a la paret.	And now the patient should lie on their back, raise their legs, and place a cloth beneath them, on which are blankets or a sheet; and then anoint the end of the cautery with oil or egg white or fenugreek mucilage or something similar; and then insert it into the anus with ease, and then the attendant should take the bag and squeeze it with two hands and fingers forcefully until everything in the instrument is evacuated into the bowels; and then remove the instrument, and the patient should lower their legs to the wall.
E si la medicina forsa aquel a eyssiment, tengua le tant quant poyra; e si dorm am aquel per tota una nueyt, es mays derier en juvament.	And if the medicine causes it to come out, hold it as long as possible; and if they sleep with it all night, it is better for healing.
Mays si tu cristerizas aquel en las malautias de solucio de ventre e l’eyssiment de lu le coyta, lahoras tu itera le cauteri entro que sia sanat.	But if you cauterize for ailments of loose bowels and evacuation of it, then you repeat the cautery until it is healed.
E si en le cul so emorroydas o apostemas ledens, lahoras sia le cristeri mot subtil e leon, dels cristeris am les quals les enfantz so criterisatz.	And if there are hemorrhoids or painful abscesses in the anus, then the cautery should be very fine and slender, like those used to cauterize children.
De curacio de las plaguas.	Of the treatment of plagues.
Yeu ja e dit en la divisio de la curacio de las plaguas aquo que convenia al libre, e yeu dic assi la curacio de aquelas am ma e am medicinas segon le conpliment.	I have already said in the division of the treatment of plagues what was appropriate for the book, and I say thus the treatment of them with hands and with medicines according to the progression.
Donc dic que las plaguas son diversificadas segon aquo en que son faytas las plaguas e segon le loc sobre le qual cazo las plaquas.	Therefore, I say that plagues are diverse depending on how they are caused and according to the place where the plague occurs.
E las causas per que motas vetz son faytas las plaguas so ayssi cum getament de peyra, o inscisio d’espaza o de cotel, o percussio am lansa, o am fustz, o am sageta, o semblantz ad aquels de motas causas.	And the causes for which plagues are often caused are thus: throwing of stones, or cutting with a sword or knife, or hitting with a spear, or with a stick, or with an arrow, or similar to those of many causes.
Mays las plaguas que so en les locz del cos so ayssi cum plagua la qual catz sobre le cap, o·l col, o·l pietz, o·l ventre, o·l fitge, e semblantz ad aquels dels membres.	But the plagues that are in the places of the body are like a plague that falls on the head, or the neck, or the feet, or the belly, or the liver, and similar to those of the limbs.
E yeu so recomtant la curacio de alcunas plaguas per que pauses aquela ratiocinacio e regla sobre las autras plaguas.	And I am recounting the treatment of some plagues so that you may apply that reasoning and rule to other plagues.
E yeu comensare de las plaguas del cap simplas, quar la rememoracio de las compostas vindra al comensament del tertz capitol.	And I will begin with the simple plagues of the head, for the memory of the compound ones will come at the beginning of the third chapter.
Donc dic que quan accideys en le cap plagua simpla e no es fractura, lahoras considera: si es per getament de peyra o de semblant, e ja ha trinquada la codena tant solament e es gran plagla e temes sobre aquel malaute havinement de apostema caut, lahoras tu te coyta e fleubotoma la cephalica tantost, e no tardas aquo; e extrats ad aquel del sanc segon la quantitat de la vertut de lu si no mes alcuna causa prohibent de fleubotomia, majorment si·l sanc que es eyssit de la plagua es pauc.	Therefore, I say that when a simple plague occurs on the head, and it is not a fracture, then consider: if it is from the throwing of a stone or similar, and it has only broken the skin and is a large wound, and you fear the onset of a hot abscess in that patient, then you should quickly bleed from the cephalic vein, and do not delay this; and draw from him the blood according to his strength, if no other cause prevents bloodletting, especially if the blood that has come out of the wound is little.
E sia la flaubotomia del contrari de la partida plaguada; e guardase le malaute de replecio e de vi e de viandas grossas.	And let the bloodletting be on the opposite side of the affected part; and guard the patient from repletion and from strong foods and drinks.
Mays si de la minuicio prohibeys alcuna causa, lahoras sia aminorat de la vianda e no apropinque a carn ni a vi.	But if some cause prohibits bloodletting, then lessen the patient's intake of food and do not allow him near meat or wine.
E pausa sobre la plagua, si a lu accideys apostema caut, coto enfus en oli rozat solet o en vi en le qual es stipticat.	And if a hot abscess occurs on the wound, apply a cloth steeped in warmed oil, or in wine in which a styptic has been soaked, to the wound.
Mays si est segur de apostema caut, lahoras pausa sobre la plagua, si es recent am le sieu sanc e le ayre no ha mudat aquela la polvera la qual yeu recomtare aprop petit.	But if a hot abscess is certain, then apply to the wound, if it is recent, its own blood, and if the air hasn't changed that powder which I shall tell you about shortly.
E si le ayre ja ha mudada aquela, lahoras pausa sobre alscus enguentz entro que sia sanada.	And if the air has already altered it, then apply some ointments until it is healed.
Mays si la plagua es gran o es per inscizio d’espaza e de semblantz, e no so ajustadas las labias de lu per puvils, lahoras ajusta aquelas am sutura segon que yeu recomtare de la sutura de lor.	But if the wound is large, or from a cut or similar injury, and its edges are not brought together by sutures, then bring those together with sutures, as I will explain concerning their suture.
Mays si la plagua ja es discuberta del os e pen, e no es retencio de lu sino un petit suspensori, lahoras inscideys aquela e aprop cura la plagua am medicinas e restaura la carn aprop en loc de codena, e comanda al malaute que sia pescut de viandas en las quals es groceza: caps e formen coyt e semblantz a lor, entro que sia compost.	However, if the wound has already exposed the bone and tendon, and there is no retention but a small suspension, then cut that, and then cure the wound with medicines and restore the flesh there, instead of codena, and command the patient to eat foods rich in fat: heads of various animals, and other similar parts, until it is complete.
E si atrobas en la codena putrefaccio e no adhereys al os, lahoras tu inscideys tot aquo poyrit e geta aquo, e aprop cura aquo.	And if you find putrefaction in the flesh and it does not adhere to the bone, then you cut away all the putrid material and throw it away, and then treat it.
Mays si en aquestas plaguas es arteria o vena de la qual fluxs de sanc pot evenir, e no es abscindida per medicinas, lahoras tu inquier sobre la arteria, e si atrobas aquela no-inscidida, lahoras tu inscideys aquela am spatum, o lia aquela; e si necessitat te provoca que aquo que havem dit no comfereys, lahoras tu cauteriza entro que·l sanc sia abscidit.	But if in these wounds there is an artery or vein from which blood flow may result, and it is not severed by medicines, then you investigate the artery, and if you find it not severed, then you sever it with a spatula, or tie it; and if necessity compels you that what we have said does not work, then you cauterize until the blood flow is stopped.
E si aquestas plaguas son simplas e petitas, lahoras la causa de lor es leugiere; enayssi que tu polverizas sobre aquelas aquesta polvera, quar consolidada aquela denant que l’ayre mude aquelas.	And if these wounds are simple and small, then their cause is slight; therefore, you can sprinkle this powder over them, for it will consolidate them before the air changes them.
E la manieyra de la polvera es aquesta: recipe oli de enses partida una, de sanc de drago partida doas, de caus no-extincta partidas tres; sia tot mot trissat e crivellat, e de lu sia la plagua omplida, e sia constrengida per bona constriccio entro que be sobre aquela aderesca, e sia coagulada am le sanc.	And the method for the powder is this: take one part of olive oil, two parts of dragon's blood, and three parts of unburnt resin; let all be finely ground and sifted, and then fill the wound with it, and bind it firmly until it adheres well to it and is coagulated by the blood.
E aprop strengeys aquela desus am pulvils e leyssa aquela, e no la deslias mentre esta ayssi que no es apostemada, quar no es eredicada de lu la medicina entro que sia sanada.	And then you bandage it with dressings and leave it, and do not remove them until it is healed, for the medicine will not be effective until it is completely healed.
E alcuna vetz fa aquo sola cautz, quan no es a tu en present enses e sanc de drago.	And sometimes this works alone, when you do not have frankincense and dragon's blood readily available.
E ja fa aquesta meteyssa operacio en las grans plaguas quan conveneys que sia pausada sobre aquelas e sian streytas, e so plaguas recentz am le lor sanc, las quals le ayre no ha alteradas.	And you perform this same operation on large wounds when it is appropriate to apply it, and they are tightly bound, and for fresh wounds with their own blood, which the air has not altered.
E si le ayre las ha alteradas, e majorment quan es en temps d’estiu, lahoras no es entencio a la posicio de aquesta polvera, mays adonc cura aquelas am aquo que havem dit, enayssi que tu pauses sobre aquelas alcus enguents degistius, o que pauses sobre aquelas pols de la farina del ordi am aygua e mel entro que getan poyredura; e aprop cura aquelas am l’autra curacio entro que sian sanadas.	And if the air has altered them, and especially when it is summertime, then this powder application is not appropriate, but rather treat them with what we have previously described, or apply digestive ointments, or a powder made from barley flour mixed with water and honey until it forms a paste; and then treat them with the other method until they are healed.
Mays si accideys am la plagua fractura en os, e es petita, lahoras tu extratz aquo am gesti.	But if, by chance, the wound is accompanied by a fractured bone, and it is small, then you extract it with a gentle action.
E yeu diyre la cura de las fracturas del cap en aquo que es envenidor.	And I will describe the treatment for head fractures in what follows.
De las plaguas del col.	Of wounds of the neck.
Mays si la plagua accideys en le col, lahoras no es en lu differencia en medicacio, e entre la plagua del cap quan es simpla.	However, if the wound happens on the neck, there is no difference in treatment, and it is treated similarly to a simple wound of the head.
Mays si ja le nervi del col es inscis o arteria, lahoras si es nervi, no es en lu engen sino que sia evitada curacio de lu am aquo que fa vehement stipticitat, ayssi cum ziniar e zegi que es vetriol e semblantz a lor quar nozo als nervis e contrazo aquel.	However, if the neck wound involves an incised nerve or artery, if it's a nerve,  it shouldn't be treated with anything that causes strong astringency, like zinc or verdigris (which is vitriol) and similar things, because they harm the nerves and resist healing.
E no pauses sobre la plagua alcuna causa de tot freja, quar la sustancia dels nervis es freja e la continuacio de lu es am le cervel, le qual es le pus aut de totz les membres.	And do not apply anything excessively cold to the wound, because the substance of the nerves is cold and their continuation is with the brain, which is the highest of all the limbs.
E si’ aquo am que es curat de medicinas leugieras, ayssi cum es caus lavada am aygua dousa, alcuna veguada enfusa en oli rozat o no-rozat, e thucia quan es lavada am aygua dousa e las autras peyras minarantz segon aquesta manieyra, e enguentz humitz.	And if it is treated with mild remedies, such as washing the wound with fresh water, sometimes infused in oil (whether it has been processed or not), and applying poultices when washing it with fresh water, and other similar medicinal stones according to this method, and moist ointments.
Mays si la plagua es gran, lahoras aministra sutura, o coarta las labias de lu, e aprop cura aquela am pulvils entro que sia sanada.	But if the wound is large, then administer sutures, or stitch the edges together, and then treat it with powders until it heals.
Mays si a la plagua es profunditat o accideys en lu a la pus bassa partida poyredura, lahoras perfora aquela en le loc mays depremegut.	But if the wound is deep or extends to the lowermost part of the tissue, then pierce it in the deepest place.
Mays si en la plagua ja es inscisa arteria e es conseguit flux de sanc, lahoras separa o secca aquela, o lia aquela, o cauteriza aquela si necessitat te provoca ad aquo.	But if an artery is already cut in the wound and blood is flowing, then either tie it off, or cauterize it if necessary.
Mays si ja ha insciditz les spondils del golayro o tot, e so salvadas las venas del col, lahoras tu ajusta las labias de la codena am sutura sobre la cana del golayro e no toques aquel; abantz egala aquel e reduzeys aquel sobre la sua figura natural, e aprop strenh aquel am strectura decent, e leyssa aquela per alcus jorns; e aprop cura aquel am enguentz en les quals es stipticitat e excitacio entro que sia sanat.	But if the vertebrae of the neck or the entire spine have been cut and the neck veins are saved, then you should stitch the edges of the spinal column together along the spine and do not touch it; initially straighten it and return it to its natural position, then tightly secure it with proper bandages, and leave it for some days.  Then treat it with ointments that are styptic and supportive until it is healed.
Mays si la plagua ja en le os a fayta enprecio, lahoras percuireys aquela, e lahoras si en lu ha fragmentz de hos, extratz totz aquels que podes de lor; e aquo que a tu no es apparelhat, leyssa aquo entro que la plagua se poyrisca, e sia separat e la egrecio de lu sia alleujada.	But if the wound has already reached the bone, treat it. Then, if there are bone fragments in it, remove all you can; and what you cannot remove, leave it until the wound can fester and separate, and the discharge is lessened.
E si la plagua es recent lahoras polveriza sobre aquela polvera la qual t’e recomtada.	And if the wound is recent, then sprinkle the powder recommended to you over it.
Mays si en la plagua es fayta fistula, lahoras cura aquela am aquo del qual la rememoracio vindra aprop en le sieu capitol.	But if a fistula has formed in the wound, then treat it with what is mentioned in its corresponding chapter.
De las plaguas del col o de semblantz quan fayta entre las spallas e es fayta am spaza o am cotel o am lansa o am semblantz.	Of wounds to the neck or similar, when made between the shoulders and caused by a blow with a club, knife, spear, or similar weapon.
Si es percussio de lansa o de cotel, e vezes de lu la profunditat, lahoras considera mays si de la plagua yeys ventositat quan le malaute elena; lahoras sapias que la plagua es mortal.	If it is a wound from a spear or knife, and you see how deep it is, then consider if the wound is becoming more inflamed when the patient weakens; if so, understand that the wound is fatal.
E si en lu no es profunditat e la plagua es recent am le sieu sanc, lahoras tu pauses en lu de la primieyra horo polvera, e no strenhas aquel per que no sia le sanc retengut en la profunditat de lu e que retorne al cor e que aucigua le malaute, mays pausa en lu enguent atractiu, e deslia aquela doas veguadas le dia.	And if it is not deep, and the wound is recent, with its own blood, then in the first hour you put powder on it, and do not press it so that the blood is not trapped deep inside and returns to the heart and kills the patient, but put an attractive ointment there, and remove it twice a day.
E si l’enguent no es a tu present, lahoras tu pausa en le orrifici de la plagua coto viel per que sucque aquo que yeys de las humiditatz; e fay que le malaute dorma sobre la plagua per que corra aquo que es en lu ajustat.	And if the ointment is not available to you, then place old lint over the wound opening to absorb any moisture; and have the patient sleep on the wound to allow any accumulated matter to drain out.
